content.rendered:
The badger-haired, trapezoidal Gru is a garden city teenager in the 70s. As a fan of the supervillain supergroup the Rogue Six, he hatches a plan to become evil enough to join them. Fortunately, he also has help in the form of loyal minions who constantly cause trouble.

Directors: Kyle BaldaBrad Ableson. Jonathan del Val

Written By Matthew Fogel. Brian Lynch

Stars: Steve Carell. Pierre Coffin. Alan Arkin
